dmca.title: [ABUSE] RE: a4y - jpegz
dmca.body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Admin <area52@bellsouth.net>
To: "'Grey'" <greymuse@hotmail.com>, <support@jpegz.com>,
<copyright@theplanet.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com>, <atlanta@fbi.gov>
Date: Tuesday, March 1, 2005, 5:48:09 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] RE:  a4y - jpegz

===8<==============Original message text===============
Att: FBI

CONTINUOUS COPYRIGHT THEFT AND THE ILLEGAL PUBLISHING OF ADULT MATERIAL NOT
MEANT FOR FREE POSTING BY BOTH THIS ATLANTA BASED FREEHOST SCHEME AND IT'S
UPSTREAM PROVIDER IN TEXAS.



THIS IS AN EVERY DAY ISSUE.









- -----Original Message-----
From: Admin [mailto:area52@bellsouth.net]
Sent: Saturday, February 26, 2005 6:36 PM
To: 'Grey'; 'support@jpegz.com'; 'copyright@theplanet.com';
'abuse@theplanet.com'
Cc: KenM (ken@asian4you.com); 'tman@asian4you.com'
Subject: RE: a4y - jpegz







- -----Original Message-----
From: Admin [mailto:area52@bellsouth.net]
Sent: Wednesday, February 23, 2005 6:44 PM
To: 'support@jpegz.com'; 'copyright@theplanet.com'; 'abuse@theplanet.com'
Cc: KenM (ken@asian4you.com); 'tman@asian4you.com'
Subject: a4y - jpegz









NOTICE of COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT







ASIAN4YOU

JPONLINE Inc.

5 Jupiter House, Calleva Park

Aldermaston

Reading Berks, UK  RG7 8NN









Date:  Feb 23. 2005



To:



JPEGZ

                                                Cyberbulk.com
                        56 MARIETTA ST NW
                        Atlanta, GA 30303
                        US
                        (800) 372-8349



      traceroute to JPEGZ.COM (70.85.73.130)

Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act  and the WIPO (World
Intellectual Property Organization)
(<http://lcweb.loc.gov/copyright/legislation/dmca.pdf>), this letter serves
as actual notice of infringement in the event of legal proceedings.



Steve Easton is a DMCA agent, NOT an attorney. On behalf of the owner of
exclusive right to the  material at issue in this notice, I hereby state
that I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by the  owner, its agent, or the law. I
hereby state, under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States,
that the information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the
owner of an exclusive right that is being infringed as set out in this
notification.
